definition: easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
to burn/to ignite/to light/fig. to spark off (hopes)/to start (debate)/to raise (hopes)

sentences.english: We must keep these combustibles away from the fire.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須使這些易燃物遠離火焰。

sentences.english: The amount of flammable material that surrounds a fire is referred to as the fuel load .
sentences.chinese: 火周圍的易燃物數量關係到可燃物負荷。

sentences.english: Do not use memory card close to heat-generating or combustible materials.
sentences.chinese: 請勿在靠近發熱材料或者易燃物品的場所使用存儲卡。

sentences.english: Are combustible materials stored in the dormitories or buildings connected to the dormitories?
sentences.chinese: 宿舍裏或與宿舍相連的樓房裏有易燃物品嗎？

sentences.english: Air leakage of a stopper will cause fire during distilling combustibles.
sentences.chinese: 蒸餾易燃物時塞子漏氣引起火災。

sentences.english: We must not take combustible goods aboard .
sentences.chinese: 我們切不可帶易燃物上車。

sentences.english: Do not place combustible material within fire spark range.
sentences.chinese: 在火花能噴射到的地方禁止放置易燃物品。

sentences.english: Your sling is flammable. Do not use it near open flames or other heat sources.
sentences.chinese: 你的揹帶是易燃物品，使用時請遠離火種或其他火源。

sentences.english: But nearly three weeks of super-dry weather have basically turned the ground into kindling.
sentences.chinese: 但近三週的超乾燥天氣，基本上使土地變成了易燃物。

sentences.english: Do not have on your person any combustibles such as a butane lighter or machines.
sentences.chinese: 請勿攜帶任何易燃物，例如丁烷打火機或其他機器。

sentences.english: How to use. Place them in a holder avoiding contact with any thing flammable.
sentences.chinese: 把它放進支架內，避免接觸任何易燃物品。

sentences.english: Move all combustibles away from the house, including firewood and lawn furniture.
sentences.chinese: 將所有易燃物品包括木炭和除草用具搬出房屋。

sentences.english: Inflammables are forbidden on the train.
sentences.chinese: 這是易燃物品，禁止帶上車。

sentences.english: Don't store any combustibles in the vicinity of this appliance.
sentences.chinese: 不要在這家電附近存放任何易燃物品。

sentences.english: Do not handle inflammable materials in open containers.
sentences.chinese: 切勿處理以開口容器盛載的易燃物品。

definition: junk/items of no value/various bits and bobs
to catch fire/to cook/to get angry
